author: Shane Magee
description: Rising Tide Community Initiatives, a Moncton affordable housing non-profit, has purchased its first properties and aims to start moving people into those buildings by Labour Day.
title: Moncton affordable housing group buys properties, aims to house people by September
content:
A Moncton affordable housing non-profit has purchased its first properties and aims to start moving people in by Labour Day.
